ygData.subject: Need advice for a trade
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a level 19(well almost) bard on Nameless.  I am wearing just about full bronze.  I have a dragoon dirk and a PGT.  I have one jagged band, thick leather
ygData.messageBody:
I am a level 19(well almost) bard on Nameless. I am wearing just
about full bronze. I have a dragoon dirk and a PGT. I have one
jagged band, thick leather apron and BS mantle. one derv ring and two
onxy earrings.

I was fighting in Runnyeye and a high level druid killed Borxx and
sold me the Lens for only 30pp!! So, now I have a Staff of the
Observers. I would like to trade this for something good like a nice
weapon, but I am not sure how much it worth or really how much any
better weapons might be worth. And advise?
